Reviews.Title: Reviews
Reviews.text_1: I quickly found the right tour for me,
Reviews.text_2: but I had a few questions about the
Reviews.text_3: hotel, I wrote to tech support and they
Reviews.text_4: answered all my questions within an
Reviews.text_5: hour. The vacation itself was perfect.
Reviews.text_6: Thank you very much. I will come back

Container_3.subTitle: Tips for flying on a plane

Container_3.text_blockRecent_2: tip: bring your co-pilot so you can take a nap,
Container_3.text_blockRecent_3: while he steers the plane for you

hotelAbout.title: About us
hotelAbout.paragraph1: Dear guests, we - Royal Hotel are already waiting for you with impatience. Here you will feel true comfort, warmth and hospitality. Our rooms are a combination of comfort and style, and the windows offer inspiring views. Here you can relax your soul, enjoy delicious breakfasts, walks, silence or adventures - choose your ideal vacation.
hotelAbout.paragraph2: Discover breathtaking views from the windows of our rooms. Enjoy delicious breakfasts prepared with care, and in the evening - walks in silence, the aroma of coffee or a glass of wine on the terrace. If you want peace - we will give you peace. If you want adventure - we will suggest the most interesting routes, excursions and impressions. At Royal Hotel, warmth, sincerity and attention to each guest reign. After all, it is important to us that you not only relax, but also want to come back again.
